author: bbuddha.xyz
content: how far back does the  `/eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/validators` endpoint work?

author: sproul
content:
depends on your node config, all the way to genesis if you configure it

if you’re running Lighthouse check: <https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/checkpoint-sync.html#reconstructing-states>

author: bbuddha.xyz
content: gotcha, is it correct to say you can fetch all validators from all states, it'll just take longer if you haven't storing checkpoints often? (https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/advanced_database.html#freezer-db-space-time-trade-offs) or is it not guaranteed?

author: sproul
content:
yeah that’s right

we have a new prototype of an archive node that makes it much more feasible to store checkpoints every epoch: <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/releases/tag/v3.4.0-tree.1>
